metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20484 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In NotificationChannel of NotificationChannel.java, there is a possible failure to persist permissions settings due to resource exhaustion. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10 Android-11 Android-12 Android-12L Android-13Android ID: A-242702851

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
